In the given paragraph, the two chemicals mentioned are hydroxytyrosol and doxorubicin.

Other entities such as "rats", "bearing breast tumors", "induced chemically", "divided into 4 groups", "control", "0.5mg / kg", "5days / week", "1mg / kg / week", and "week" do not refer to chemicals and can be disregarded.
